sections.title: Business Model
paragraphs: BYD operates across vehicles, batteries, and components, with scale advantages and vertical integration.
See computed tables for per-year drivers and margins.

sections.title: Thesis
paragraphs: We assume durable growth converging to stable levels, with value anchored on discounted FCFF.
Pricing power and capital efficiency remain key assumptions.

sections.title: Drivers
paragraphs: Growth and margin paths trend toward stable targets per scenario settings.
Sales-to-capital reflects reinvestment needs implied by growth.

sections.title: Risks
paragraphs: Execution, pricing pressure, and policy shifts (tariffs) pose risks to the base case.

sections.title: Scenarios
paragraphs: Scenario toggles govern consensus/comps/news steps and convergence thresholds.

sections.title: Market vs Value
paragraphs: We compare last close to intrinsic value per share for framing discount/premium.
